page.title: 16VILLAGE HALL_HUB OF MILTON.
page.content: Recreation in Milton revolves round the Village Hall.Newly decorated after having new heating installed,it has a lovely mural painted by the school pupils.The{Badminton}Club meets every Monday.On Tuesdays{Mothers and } {Toddlers}meet.Mothers drink tea while toddlers play with toys.The{Senior } {Youth Club,}on Wednesdays,is making rafts for the race at Lochore Meadows. Milton won last year. On Thursdays {Junior Youth Club}meets.Unihoc,a team game,where a ball is hit with a stick into a goal,is a favourite game.The Clubs went to the beach sports at St Andrews and won the sandcastle competition.A Whist and Domino Drive, instead of a speaker,was held at the monthly meeting of the{Women's Rural } {Institute.}The{Gala and Fund Raising } {Committee}meet often to think of ways of preserving Village Life.
